I came across [https://github.com//issues/6082] and https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7547 where the suggested fix was to add "./" to the model name. But, in this case I'm not able find the list of codes where I'm supposed to make the change. How do I find the code that needs the fix? Or is there another issue that I'm unaware of?

Please help.
